description: Number of integers less than A000108(n) relatively prime to A000108(n).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
prog: (PARI)je=[]; for(n=1,50,je=concat(je,eulerphi(binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1)))); je(Sage) [euler_phi(binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1))for n in xrange(0,28)]# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 06 2009](PARI) { for (n=0, 200, write("b062624.txt", n, " ", eulerphi(binomial(2*n, n)/(n + 1))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 04 2001
